comment.author: 43854658@N00
comment._content: Translation (English): Portuguese Railway Company (CP) -- Private carriage of Queen Dona Maria Pia (Maria Pia of Savoy) [photo], a gift of her father Vittorio Emanuele II, the first King of Italy, on the occasion of her marriage to Dom Luis I, the King of Portugal and the Algarves, on October 6, 1862. Undated photo by Mário Novais.

comment.author: 43854658@N00
comment._content: This is such an elegant coach!  I've only seen a handful of private coaches, but none as magnificent as this.  I imagine the center wheels made the ride smoother.

comment.realname: Biblioteca de Arte / Art Library Fundação Calouste Gulbenkian
